Praesent feugiat est auctor lacus consectetur, vitae pellentesque dolor laoreet.
In this App was created with the thought of spreading the message of Happy giving.

It is designed to cater to the NGO community who have specific needs at a Various juncture and they are unable to connect themselves to a sponsor who on the other side is unable to find a genuine need for the receiving his donation. iGiver will act as the bridge between a donor and the recipient.Where donor identity will not be revealed unless he shortlists the recipient based on his criteria.
